trans-unit.source: Defines identifiers that are used to indicate selection rules for a component.
trans-unit.target: 定義用來表示元件的選取範圍規則的識別項。

trans-unit.source: These identifiers indicate whether a component has some form of visible user interface and whether the user can take actions to move or alter the size of the component.
trans-unit.target: 這些識別碼會指出元件是否有某種形式的可見的使用者介面，以及使用者是否可執行動作，以移動或改變的元件大小。

trans-unit.source: Indicates the component supports sizing in all directions.
trans-unit.target: 指出此元件支援所有的方向調整大小。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Indicates the component supports resize from the bottom.
trans-unit.target: 指出元件支援從底部調整大小。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Indicates the component supports resize from the left.
trans-unit.target: 表示從左邊的元件支援調整大小。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Indicates the component is locked to its container.
trans-unit.target: 表示元件已鎖定至其容器。

trans-unit.source: Overrides the Moveable, AllSizeable, BottomSizeable, LeftSizeable, RightSizeable, and TopSizeable bit flags of this enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 覆寫這個列舉型別的可移動、 AllSizeable、 BottomSizeable、 LeftSizeable、 RightSizeable 和 TopSizeable 位元旗標。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Indicates the component supports a location property that allows it to be moved on the screen.
trans-unit.target: 指出此元件支援的位置屬性，好讓它在螢幕上移動。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Indicates no special selection attributes.
trans-unit.target: 表示沒有特殊的選取項目屬性。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Indicates the component supports resize from the right.
trans-unit.target: 表示從右邊的元件支援調整大小。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Indicates the component supports resize from the top.
trans-unit.target: 表示元件支援調整大小，從最上方。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Indicates the component has some form of visible user interface and the selection service is drawing a selection border around this user interface.
trans-unit.target: 指出元件有某種形式的可見的使用者介面，並選取服務這個使用者介面周圍繪製選取框線。

trans-unit.source: If a selected component has this rule set, you can assume that the component implements <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"></xref> and that it is associated with a corresponding designer instance.
trans-unit.target: 如果已選取的元件具有這個規則集，您可以假設元件實作<xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"> </xref> ，而且它是對應的設計工具執行個體相關聯。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。
